name: Fields of Fire (mololo)
description:
A tower defense game, where you have to protect your farm against evil Vegetables.

Tutorial:

  • Unlock turrets using coins (dropped by killing enemies)
  • Buy turrets using resources (harvest them by pressing the harvest button on the screen)
  • Resources are generated infinitely but are capped by storage
  • Upgrade units using resources

Coins:

  • Dropped by enemies
  • Can buy farm upgrades
  • Can unlock turrets
  • Can buy lives

Resources:

  • Can buy Turrets
  • Can upgrade Turrets
  • Press the "HARVEST" button
  • Are generated in time but can be sped up
  • Can increase the amount generated by upgrading production and size
  • Can increase the max cap by upgrading storage
